to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: DECpc is silent
body:
What does your /var/log syslog or messages say about the installing of
the module?  If it is any different than the messages you've already
provided?  Also what happens if you cat something to
/proc/speakup/synth_direct or to /dev/synth?

  Kirk
